CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

ConnectorStatusEnumType.description: This contains the current status of the Connector.

timestamp.description: The time for which the status is reported. If absent time of receipt of the message will be assumed.

evseId.description: The id of the EVSE to which the connector belongs for which the the status is reported.

connectorId.description: The id of the connector within the EVSE for which the status is reported.
